short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add sidebar for ChatGPT to quick jump.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Sidebar Plugin

Enhance your ChatGPT experience with our sidebar plugin! This extension adds a convenient sidebar to ChatGPT, allowing you to quickly jump to any question in your current conversation. Key features include:

Quick Navigation: Display all questions in the current conversation for easy access.
One-Click Jump: Click on any question in the sidebar to instantly jump to its location.
Collapsible Sidebar: Easily collapse the sidebar when not needed to save space.
Compact Mode: Click the icon to reduce the line spacing in ChatGPT for a more compact view.
Streamline your interactions with ChatGPT and navigate your conversations effortlessly with the ChatGPT Sidebar Plugin.
